```{r}
library(haven)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)


library(ggiraphExtra)
```



```{r}
# Daten einlesen
# in chunk fehler ausblenden
setwd("X:/libraries/RTutor_BA")
data <- read_csv(".Data/main_data.csv")

```

```{r}
# Exemplarisch fuer "EAST Interconnection"

data_1 <- data %>% 
  select(date, intercn, CO2MASS, coal_price, gasprice, meant, load, nonFossil, so2price, netNSflow) %>% 
  mutate(CR = coal_price/gasprice, CO2MASS=CO2MASS/1000000) %>% 
  filter(intercn=="EAST")
```



```{r}
fit4 <- lm(CO2MASS ~ CR + load + meant + nonFossil + so2price + netNSflow, data_1)

p4 <- predict(fit4, data_1)


regression.result(fit4)

effectplot(fit4, show.ci = TRUE)


pispl <- periodicSpline(data_1$gasprice, p4)



```
